name: Gangplank
title: the Saltwater Scourge
shortBio: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see Bilgewater bathed in blood once more before letting someone else take itâ€”and now with pistol, cutlass, and barrels of gunpowder, he is determined to reclaim what he has lost.

skins.name: Sailor Gangplank
skins.description:
O, Bilgewater has been my home,
Since last time I was sailing!
But I'll not stay another day,
I'd sooner be out whaling.

skins.name: Toy Soldier Gangplank
skins.description: Gangplank is a model soldier in the toy army, racking up an impressive array of victories against the dolls and stuffed animals. He hopes to one day be named Toy General, leading his troops into glorious battle.

skins.name: Special Forces Gangplank
skins.description: How special are the special forces? Let's put it this way: they're the only unit in the military with unlimited access to oranges.

skins.name: Sultan Gangplank
skins.description: Gangplank is a ruler from a distant land, and tales of his battle prowess and flowing red beard have reached even the farthest-flung city-states. As all rulers from distant lands, he also sports a snappy hat.

skins.name: Captain Gangplank
skins.description: Gangplank was a legendary murderer and cutthroat, prior to having his ship blown up while he was still on it. The silhouette of his famed captain's jacket is still burned into the memory of more than one unlucky sailor... with many convinced the man is somehow still alive.

skins.name: Dreadnova Gangplank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Steel Valkyrie event.

skins.description: Once a high ranking admiral in the Royal Space Military, Gangplank's reign of terror began when he stole and proliferated blueprints for a former colleague's experimental superweapon. Ending a thousand-year civil war in an instant, he defected with a massive armed battalion and formed the interplanetary criminal network known as the Dreadnova Corps.

skins.name: Pool Party Gangplank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Gangplank is the self-crowned King of the Grill, but his summer bod is the real life of the party. There should be a law against those abs.

skins.name: FPX Gangplank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Honoring GimGoon's winning performance as Gangplank during the 2019 World Championship.

skins.name: Gangplank the Betrayer

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Energized by a mysterious amulet containing Viego of Camavor and wielding the Blade of the Ruined King, Gangplank's personality erupted as he raged in search of the long-lost Isolde. Though ultimately freed of the King's influence by a group of heroes, he carries the experience with him... a reminder, perhaps, of true power.

skins.name: PROJECT: Gangplank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Leader of the Command Line with a merciless reputation, Gangplank's access to dangerous PROJECT tech allows him to rule the city with a cybernetic fist. But when an insubordinate program wreaks havoc on his domain, he resorts to manipulating former Outcasts to protect his legacy and wipe the virus out for good.

passive.name: Trial by Fire
passive.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

spells.name: Parrrley
spells.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

spells.name: Remove Scurvy
spells.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
spells.dynamicDescription: Gangplank consumes a large amount of citrus fruit, removing all <status>Disabling</status> effects and restoring <healing>@BaseHealth@ plus @Effect2Amount@% missing Health</healing>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Powder Keg
spells.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Gangplank places a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank and enemy champions for @Effect5Amount@ seconds. When an enemy destroys it, the keg is defused. When Gangplank destroys it, it explodes, Slowing by @FinalSlowAmount@% for @Effect2Amount@ seconds and dealing the Attack's damage, ignoring @Effect10Amount@% Armor. Champions take an additional @Effect3Amount@ physical damage.

Keg health decays every @f5@ seconds. Keg explosions detonate other kegs with overlapping blast zones, but don't deal damage to the same target more than once. Keg explosions triggered by Parrrley will grant the bonus gold for targets killed.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Cannon Barrage
spells.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Gangplank signals his ship to fire @TotalWavesTooltip@ waves of cannonballs anywhere on the map over @ZoneDuration@ seconds. Each wave Slows by @SlowPercent@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds and deals @OneWaveDamage@ magic damage. Maximum damage: @TotalDamageTooltip@

This Ability can be upgraded in the shop via Parrrley.

Fire at Will: Fires 6 additional waves of cannonballs.
Death's Daughter: Fires a Mega-Cannonball that deals @DeathsDaughterDamage@ true damage and Slows by @DeathsDaughterSlow@% for @DeathsDaughterSlowDuration@ second.
Raise Morale: Allies inside Cannon Barrage gain @RaiseMoraleHaste@% Move Speed for @RaiseMoraleHasteDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
